moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 exd4 4. Nxd4 c5: If he had played Be6 I would have played Qd3 unpinning my knight and putting his Bishop on a less desirable square.
moves.10. Qxe6 Qxe6 11. Bxe6 Nd4 12. Bb3 c4: bad move he should just take the Bishop.
Time to round up the a pawn.
moves.22... a2 23. Rhc1: If i play nxa2 right away Rc2+ does me in.
moves.23... Rb8 24. Nxa2 Nxa2 25. Rxa2 Rb7: Better than 25...Rxb3 26.Rc8+ Bd8 27.Rxa7 and when I get the chance Bg5.
moves.26. Rc8+ Bd8 27. Bg5 Kd7 28. Rxd8+ Rxd8: liquidating 2 pawns up seals the deal.
moves.30. Kc3 Ke7 31. f4 Kf6 32. Ra6 Ke6 33. e: He resigned as there is no chance of him winning unless I die or just flip out in this game.
